services.title: UX Design & Content Strategy
services.summary: We bring foundational user experience (UX) design and sound content strategy to every project. A wise man once said, "Design without strategy is just decoration." We agree completely.

services.title: Custom Web Design
services.summary: Using the innovative Style Tile approach, we'll work with you to bring your brand to the web in a unique and structured way while providing you with creative options. It'll be pretty too.

services.title: WordPress CMS Development
services.summary: Not only will we build the site so you can manage every aspect of the content yourself, we'll painstakingly craft the Dashboard to make it a cinch for you to use.

services.title: Future Proof Web Development
services.summary: We work hard to stay on the leading edge of development best practices. HTML5, grid systems, page load optimization, script minimizing, and more. It is as impressive as it sounds.

services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.summary: It's not just a buzz word or something fancy. It's about accessibility and that's important. The easier it is for your users to get to your content, the better your site will convert.

services.title: Search Engine Optimization
services.summary: What's the point of building a new website if no one sees it? We'll integrate your shiny new website with keywords and Google magic to super charge your search results.
